description:
In Neo Tokyo, disillusioned youth form tribes that battle each other in an intense game called Extreme Baseball. One night, two kids – Haru Shirogane and Taiga – meet the strongest XB Player Shun Kamiya. Haru and Taiga join Shun's group, the Minato Tribe, to play this cutthroat game against a mysterious man who has begun taking control of all the tribes. Can they defeat him before it’s too late?

(Source: Funimation)

tags.name: Baseball
tags.description: Centers around the sport of baseball.

tags.name: Cyberpunk
tags.description: Set in a future of advanced technological and scientific achievements that have resulted in social disorder.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Delinquents
tags.description: Features characters with a notorious image and attitude, sometimes referred to as "yankees".

tags.name: Gore
tags.description: Prominently features graphic bloodshed and violence.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

tags.name: Revenge
tags.description: Prominently features a character who aims to exact punishment in a resentful or vindictive manner.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

node.description: **Michiko Yokote** is a Japanese scriptwriter. She is the pupil of [Kazunori Itou](https://anilist.co/staff/97941).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/KoudenMS)

Masafumi Takada is a japanese composer and sound designer best known for his work on the soundtracks for killer7, God Hand, No More Heroes, and the Earth Defense Force and the Danganronpa series.

Rui Komatsuzaki is best known as the main concept artist of the Danganronpa franchise.

Komatsuzaki was a sculpture graduate before becoming involved with Spike, and Danganronpa was his first experience as a character designer.

(Source: Danganronpa Wiki)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/kazkodaka/)

A former employee of Spike Chunsoft and the co-founder of Too Kyo Games. He is primarily known for being the creator and scenario writer of the _Danganronpa_ video game series.

[Website](https://miyavi.com/)  | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/miyavi_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/miyavi_ishihara/) | [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/MIYAVI.OFFlCIAL/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC_nn4TlgMKp2li_kvUcWsg) | [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/artist/7sBtBCNVRujQhaHDODkfTN)

Takamasa Ishihara, otherwise better known by stage name Miyavi, is a Japanese vocalist, guitarist, lyricist, composer, actor, record producer, and businessman. He is known for his finger-slapping style of playing a guitar. He has been active since 1999, first as guitarist for the now defunct visual kei rock band Dué le Quartz and then as a solo artist starting in 2002. 

In 2007, he became a member of the rock supergroup S.K.I.N., and in 2009 founded his own company, J-Glam. He toured worldwide several times, with over 250 shows in 30 countries as of 2015. As of 2016, he has released ten solo albums and 27 singles.

__[Profile (Lantis)](https://www.lantis.jp/artist/Void_Chords/bio.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RyoTakahashi111)__

__Ryo Takashi__, alternatively known as Void_Chords, is a Japanese composer, arranger, music producer, bassist and DJ. He also works with the doujin group FELT under the alias Maurits "ZEN" Cornelis.
